p: Human rabies case records ( Fig 1A) in Yunnan from 1999 to 2015 were obtained from the Yunnan Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and the Chinese CDC. In China, human rabies is a class B notifiable infectious disease and all human cases must be reported to the Chinese CDC. Rabies cases were confirmed according to diagnostic criteria (WS281–2008) from the Ministry of Health of the People’s Republic of China.
